channel.title: Overclocking on OzoneOC
channel.description: Recent content in Overclocking on OzoneOC

item.title: Memory Overclocking
item.description: Guides: # MemTestHelper DDR4 OC Guide # Stress Tests # y-cruncher # Run application and select “Component Stress Tester”. Disable all tests but N32, N64, VST - Then select “Start stress testing”. Run for 4 iterations. This is good at picking out errors that the main stress test may not., especially on Alderlake CPUs. TestMem5 # This is the best option for stressing DDR4 memory. Run and load the anta777 Extreme1 config, and make sure the application is running as admin for stressing memory.
